actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Moriches and Shinnecock Inlets, New York.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project for Moriches and Shinnecock Inlets, New York, to require the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to take action to stabilize Moriches Inlet at ten feet mean low water. Makes the Secretary responsible for the operation and maintenance of such project. Requires contributions from local interests.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Moriches and Shinnecock Inlets, New York.
